name: Call Of Creamy Bean Ops
description:
Call Of Creamy Is A 1v1 Game To Play With Friends Or Other People.

You Must Pick A Player Type, Each Having Small Perks To Help In Battle.

Next Is Selecting A Gun, They Are All A Little Similar, The Only Difference Between Them Is The Fire Rate And Damage.

Finally You Must Select Your Appearance, This Will NOT Affect Game play.

CONTROLS

W A S D - Move Around

Arrow Keys - Dashing  

Click - Fire

R - Reload

Use Your Mouse To Aim

HAVE FUN
